title: Hows everyones placements going?
body:
Finished silver 3 last season.


went 6 - 4 for these 10 games and am now silver 2.

wbu u guys?

replies.body: Was silver 1, went 5/10 and got bronze 1, was really disappointed since I was in gold promos at the end and now it's put me way back down here. I'm not complaining about riots system or whatever but I do think an entire devision lower for going even seems a little harsh.

So many people are going to have this very bad experience with the current system.  It really does suck.   What stupid logic dictates that the first game is so important?  Lots of great players are going to lose their first game through no fault of their own, and lots of rubbish players will win their first game through having 4 awesome team mates.  It just doesn't make sense.

The whole concept is ridiculous.  Why even do a reset unless its a hard reset that gives everyone a chance to regrade properly?  If Riots goal is to keep everyone roughly where they were, but have everyone drop slightly (which is what they've said) then why no just soft reset by dropping everyone 3 divisions?  

If the assumption is that people are roughly where they should be then why build a system that regrades based on only 10 games?  The previous season was based on hundreds of games.  Surely that counts for more.

It also depends on the order of wins and losses.

The first game counts for the most, and then less as you go on in your placements, so if you lost your first 2/3 it can really damage the MMR you have even if you managed to turn it even.

Then mine makes even less sense . . . won 8 out of 10 . . . won the first 5 in a row. As I said, I know I'm not good but I just feel like there was absolutely no point to me doing so well in placements because I still end up in the same league

Yeah this season's one seems to be a lot more harsh on the reset part from what i've heard, lots of people i know are winning 7-8+ and actually going down, and when it becomes a division it's kinda questionable, especially given that they were playing at that MMR last season.

What it also means though is that it's harder for the scrubs to actually get to higher MMR's through no actual decent play.
I am currently 1 - 0 in provisionals! excited to get back into the ranked.

yo can i get a lose prevented for this game http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/FUoYn0OA-i-dont-care-about-name-and-shame-loss-prevent-pls

played first placement match
lost 6 : 45 or something
i was jg and got 4 kills
mid was mal playing against LB, 1/12
bot was leona and vayne, both 0/10
top was jax, 1/6?
not playing placements until few weeks later
1-9. Plat 1.

the troll is strong in this one

OR

played on another account in which case.. good job!
How is he a troll? He was Diamond last season..? Or am I missing something
i believe the FNDRR22DxD account hadnt played placements yet....
wtf
So happy, lost a game that should have been ours and got loss prevented xD
Finished pre-season Gold 3 and got Gold 3 again 6/4
Went 5-5 and got Plat II
i got 5 - 5 and got bronze 5..
i went 2-10 and got banned from league

child was, i believe, diamond last season.

so you cant just complain that you went from bronze to bronze...when someone went from diamond to plat with the same win rate as you. its no comparison.

Finished silver 1 last season went 4-6 where 5 outta 10 games had hardcore feeders and 1 afk whole game... now bronze 1.
Check out this drop on lolking attached

went 5/10 hard carried the ones that I won, and was the only one to put up a fight in the ones that i lost.

GG Bronze 2???

What's even better is a friend of mine went 2/10 fed every single game and got silver 4???

WTF XD either way guess I'll have to climb myself out once again, it is quite challenging at this elo and def does demoralize you at times. {{item:3151}} {{item:3070}}

The worst part is that ive heard of golds dropping to bronze 1 etc, who knows maybe they got worse or something?

Was 5-4 and in a really favorable matchup for my last match...

 BAM servers DC every single member of my team repeatedly over and over meanwhile my lane opponent plays on unaffected, farming up a lead and then going to roam while I continued to be DCd, getting every single lane ahead.

 After that BS ruining my mood for the night, I don't dare touch ranked until I know these servers are actually stable.
that sounds more like drop hack

Was ur lane opponent a tolan?


Probably rav hes a notorious drophacker.

Silver 2 last season (for 2 hours because I finished placements at 10pm on Jan 20th).

After the reset went 6-4 in the order WWWWLWLWLL .

Got reset to Silver 5 with MMR at around 1300.  At least its not Bronze.

1350 MMR got me Silver 2 last year so the MMR scale seems to have moved down.

%%%%ing %%%%.. i keep getting trollers so i went 5 - 5  and got Bronze 5........ 4 of those dang games i had some %%%%wits trolling 1 i just sucked at.. Riot why do u do this to me man.. u put me with %%%% ppl who can't play for %%%%.. putting me againt good players.. SO SICK OF THIS FFS SO %%%%ING BS.. and dont report this lol im just so pissed off with the league community (trollers i mean)
If you weren't destined to be in bronze, you'd be able to carry bronze 5's even when trolling.

that's just not true. A good team  wins a game which is more true as you rise up the ladder.  Carrying is almost irrelevant as kills don't actually equate to objectives. Sure they help, but they only make towers easier for you to push but with the added target on yo back. Try carrying as anyone who cant destroy 5 men and a tower solo without spreading some kills around and see how well you can win by yourself.  Not saying you can't bronze 5 smurf and eat nubs but chances you will win with the solo attitude are reaaaaaaaaaaaaally low. Unless you yi or trynd main. as for my placements i really just did really bad and counter-picked pretty hard as well. mostly my fault, lost 7 and about 350+ mmr putting me down a division and a half. Its pretty sad but the players are kinda better here in bronze. They ask for blues, they don't just jungle all game, the adc will tell you if they are overly passive and people actually play every role better than silvers in general. The farm game and targetting is unreal though...

>Carrying is almost irrelevant as kills don't actually equate to objectives.

Hint: Most professional games end in an Ace.

Kills do equate to objectives, it's a matter of what you do when you have the kills.

Just as a note, if you believe boosting exists, then you can solo carry MOST games.
yeah ik.. im just sick of getting trollers..

smurf accounts are to blame the gold+ players think they can just troll every one into bronze keeping the top tier open for there friends and wont allow you to advance 1 day u get great players the next u get trolled, lack of tribunal is also a massive contributor to trolls as the reports we send in dont do anything. ive reported umpteen players last season only to see them the very next day doing the same thing!  RIOT needs to administer tribunal immediately !

I know I'm trash and I'm not claiming otherwise, but I do wonder what the point of placement is . . . seems people can do not so well and be placed higher, and vice-versa. I won 8/10 and am back in B5 (the next closest person in my league got 6/10). So yeah, I don't get how it works. #datbronzelyfe

its not meant to make sence the ranked system is rigged i got trolled 6-10 matches absolutely a friggin joke!  trolling is to strong from oceanic.  riot needs to wake up and fix the game match makeing system cause its so broken right now its not funny!
6/4 Gold 2 Season 4 Gold 3
Not going anywhere near ranked till riots sever, firewall, DC's, connection/reconnection and lag issues are sorted. I am hoping to play ranked before March but not looking good
7-3 got silver 3
Last season i got 7/3 I got placed in b3 and my friend she won 6/4 and she got placed in s2 like wtf the ranked system is so confusing.

I think it heavily depends on the first couple of games that heavily alter your mmr. If you lose your first 1-2 games you mmr will decrease significantly because it shows that you can't handle being that high up (so silvers only have to have super noob/good unrankeds, while the rest fall drastically to bronze elo).

I'm confused as to how these work. I just finished mine and went 4-6, I was Gold 2 in pre-season with mmr hovering around p5-g1 and I got placed in Silver 1. Would be nice if someone could explain how this has happened.
WTF- i was silver 1 last season finished 7-3 and got silver 3 was gold 5 pre season
8-2 Silver 1 and not stopping my goal was high gold and I'm getting there...
went 5-5 after starting off as 1-3 :/ got plat 2. So many %%%%%%s and trolls regardless of what elo you're in. OCE is just awful
a joke. was silver4 now b5, out of my 10 placement games 1/9, every game afk's troll's feeders and just bad skills. im not saying im not at fault for some but ffs, now i just cant get off tilt.
same bro. exactly the same. except i won 3 somehow, still b5 mmr.
bro, i feel for you
well i went 2-10 im bronze 5 because of trolls, i swear to god i might start playing dota
